name: HEAVENSCAPE
description:
HEAVENSCAPE is a 3D horror roguelike  meant to invoke    PC Games from the early 2000s. You play as a character named ANGEL, who is an angel traveling home from a party at night. Find a path home, meet friends    and avoid dangers.  Be careful - if your phone's battery runs out, its over...

Please note that this is a demo and some features may have bugs and errors. If you encounter a bug that prevents you from finishing the demo, please let us know via the comments. Additionally,  feedback is super welcomed! If  you have reviews, please include them in the comment section as well. 

If you  need additional help for the demo, please check the walkthrough included with the  build~!
